release_notes:
**New Features:**
• Additional randomization controls in Preferences menu (algorithms + colors, algorithm only, or colors only)
• Add to Favorites button for custom presets, custom color palettes and custom color presets
• Added undo/redo keyboard shortcuts
• Added 6 new color palettes presets

download_info.instructions:
